author: Odeinoichus
title: A Strange Case of Legal Dodging.
review:
Set #71020 Black Vulcan: Due to an issue at the time with the rights to a certain character, the team behind Super Friends created Black Vulcan to replace the disputed Black Lightning. This character can control lightning, and do a host of other things similar to The Flash, but he is not a Speed Force user.

This character uses The Flash's helmet, the rest of him is done up to match the animation model, and he looks pretty spiffy, with a large yellow bolt on his chest and two yellow boots thanks to his dual-moulded feet. He includes twin lightning effects to hold. He's a nice character for the Super Friends fans. I'd recommend tracking one down if you like the character or want a complete Super Friends Roster on your shelf. Recommended.
